OrgName: Sirota Consulting Corp., Sirota Consulting LLC and
activities: Sirota Consulting is engaged in organizational attitude assessments, including, primarily, employee and customer attitude surveys.  In administering employee attitude surveys on behalf of global organizations, Sirota Consulting may receive limited personal information relating to employees resident in within the EU. This generally takes the form of statistical reporting relying on aggregate employment data using anonymized or pseudonymized data.
eucountries: Austria, Belgium, Bulgaria, Cyprus, Czech Republic, Denmark, Estonia, Finland, France, Germany, Greece, Hungary, Iceland, Ireland, Italy, Latvia, Liechtenstein, Lithuania, Luxembourg, Malta, Netherlands, Norway, Poland, Portugal, Romania, Slovakia, Slovenia, Spain, Sweden, Switzerland, United Kingdom
recoursemech: The Company will cooperate with data protection authorities located in the EU (DPAs) and Switzerland (FDPIC).
